nodes.text: The Loronar B-7 light freighter was a starship used throughout the Galaxy.

It was 19 meters long, it carried 1 pilot, 1 gunner, 8 passengers, and 1 metric ton of cargo.
It boasted only 1 laser cannon.
The B-7 was manufactured decades before the Clone Wars.
The bounty hunter Cradossk used a B-7 leased from the Guild early in his career.

During the last months of the Clone Wars, Grand Master Yoda purchased a B-7 freighter to take Jedi Padawans Whie Malreaux and Scout, Tac-Spec Footman droid Fidelis and himself from Jovan Station to Vjun to meet Count Dooku.
In 3 BBY, the B-7 Starhaven belonged to the spy Aveca Dunn.
One B-7, the Muvon, was part of the FarStar's complement during the Galactic Civil War.
